title: Still can't access club (for 3 months now)
body:
Hi,

I created a club for my mates when clubs first came out (tag OMNIX).  Months ago I noticed I was no longer in the club.

Apparently, to all members, it appears as though I am active and still owner of the club, but in my client I can't access the club and my team tag is not displayed in lobby or in game.

It's been happening to plenty of users - check the club forums - and clubs have been around for a while now; please address this issue.

Thanks

replies.body:
you should have found the answer then:

Send in a support ticket.

You must send a support ticket with the following:

Club Name:
Club Tag:
Other members OR the name of an Officer in the club:
Can other members see your name:

The Officer will be granted ownership of the club as you have to be removed in order to be re-added. You will need to ask for ownership back from that person.
If your club does not have an officer, you must nominate a member to gain ownership.

or i could just do none of those things let clubs randomly fix themselves after about 9 months
yep, all g
